name: Create Word and PDF documents with Plumsail from Google Forms data
description: Automate the generation of documents in your company: create DOCX and PDF files from a template using Plumsail Documents. The scenario is started when a form is submitted in Jotform. Files will be saved in Google Drive. This works equally well with SharePoint, Dropbox, OneDrive, and other storage platforms. You can use it to create applications, orders, invoices, etc.
